question: 危篤
sourceMnemonic: If someone is so <kanji>dangerous</kanji> that they <kanji>deliberately</kanji> hurt you, you're going to end up in <vocabulary>critical condition</vocabulary>. This wasn't an accident, they knew what they were doing and they didn't miss. Now you're <vocabulary>on the verge of death</vocabulary>. Hold on, kiddo.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
